attributes.action: Death penalty to the beasts who take the innocence from our country's children through rape, exploitation and murder.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to stop our poor children being prayed on like lion pray on cattle our children have the right to be protected from animals that take away their innocence through their sick minded sexual needs! We are the voice of the children that need to stand up to our government to say that the punishments that these people receive for raping or murdering children is not acceptable and that they will never reform they were born with their sick minds and will die with their sick thoughts. We need 100,000 signatures for even the government to look at this! Please help our children's children by giving them a safe world to live in from these animals
